data.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

data.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

data.quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Art is always and everywhere the secret confession, and at the same time the immortal movement of its time.
data.author: Karl Marx

data.quote: The meaning of peace is the absence of opposition to socialism.
data.author: Karl Marx

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
data.author: Simone de Beauvoir

data.quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
data.author: Stephen Hawking

data.quote: I am proud of the fact that I never invented weapons to kill.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: The three great essentials to achieve anything worth while are: Hard work, Stick-to-itiveness, and Common sense.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: Exploration by real people inspires us.
data.author: Stephen Hawking

data.quote: I know that I am intelligent, because I know that I know nothing.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
data.author: Stephen Hawking

data.quote: We hire people who want to make the best things in the world.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: By improving health, empowering women, population growth comes down.
data.author: Bill Gates
